In this series Serral decides to cheese in practically every game, even though he's usually a macro Zerg. These games were played in the lower bracket of the HomeStory Cup 22 playoffs. value.title: This is why SC2 isn’t played on 50% hit points | PiG's Lab - StarCraft 2
